name: Metamagic
rules: Choose two Metamagic options; you use them to modify spells by spending Sorcery Points.
You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it unless an option says otherwise.
limits: Whenever you gain a Sorcerer level, you can replace one Metamagic option.
You gain two additional options at Sorcerer level 10 and two more at level 17.
